data.text: Ayub nochako wuoyo kendo mowacho niya,
“Akwongʼora gi nying Jehova Nyasaye
bende asingora ni kapod angima
to dhoga ok nowach gimoro marach,
Ok abi yie ngangʼ ni un kare;
Abiro siko mana ka awacho ni an kare ndalona duto;
“Mad wasika duto mapiem koda,
Koso geno mane ma ngʼama ok ongʼeyo Nyasaye dibedgo ka ongʼad ndalone,
Bende Nyasaye chiko ite
Bende onyalo bedo gi mor kuom Jehova Nyasaye Maratego?
“Abiro puonji kaka teko Nyasaye chalo;
Un duto ngʼato ka ngʼato useneno ma gi wangʼu
“Chandruok ma Nyasaye ochano ne ngʼama timo timbe mahundu,
Kata ne bed ni nyithinde ngʼeny manade,
Tuo noneg joma otony e lweny,
Kata jaricho chok fedha mangʼeny manade,
to gik mochokogo joma kare ema biro rwako,
Ot mogero yomyom ka mbuyi mar otiengʼ,
Onindo ka en gi mwandu, to ochiewo gi lwete nono;
Masiche nomakgi ka ohula motuch apoya;
Yamb ugwe tingʼe midhi kode, mi olal nono;
Enogo kuomgi koko matek ma ok oweyonigi thuolo,
Yamo nokudh kuomgi ka giringo
